basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=2.5-5 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=5-10 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=5-10 µM), Pediococcus acidilactici (MIC=20-40 µM).Fungi:Neurospora crassa (MIC=10-20 µM), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=5-10 µM), Nectria haematococca (MIC=5-10 µM), Trichoderma viride (MIC=20-40 µM), Alternaria brassicicola (MIC=5-10 µM), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=10-20 µM), A. pisi (MIC=20-40 µM).
